Descrip: The directory where dependent scripts are stored. This will be set as the working directory for the program. This should be set to where the 'mapping' directory is located
whether permutation testing is conducted (value: 1-yes; 0 - no)
phenotype that will be analyzed ('metabolite', 'weight', 'trehalose', and 'TG' have been tested)
The sex of weight phenotype samples being analyzed (values include "Male" and "Female")
The version of the weight phenotype that is being analyzed ('original' and 'avgbyvial' have been tested)
full path and file name of the dataset to analyze
the directory the residual values for the metabolomic data is stored. This can be ignored for non-metabolomic analyses

T/F if an epistatic model is run. F is normal mapping with additive, dominant and full effects; T is additive with epistatic effects for all pairs of QTLs with the indicated epistatic QTL (epistaticQTL parameter)
Integer (out of the total number of QTLs tested) for the epistatic model that will be run
Number of permutations to perform for permutation testing
the type of survival data being analyzed (values = pupal; larvae). This can be ignored for non-survival analyses.
type of survival data transformation analyzed. This can be ignored for non-survival analyses.
name of the response for survival analysis. This can be ignored for non-survival analyses.
